mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.huiyishi_uuid_number as huiyishiUuidNumber ,a.huiyishi_address as huiyishiAddress ,a.huiyishi_size as huiyishiSize ,a.huiyishi_types as huiyishiTypes ,a.zhuangtai_types as zhuangtaiTypes ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM huiyishi a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.huiyishi_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.huiyishiUuidNumber},'%')
and a.huiyishi_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.huiyishiAddress},'%')
and a.huiyishi_size like CONCAT('%',#{params.huiyishiSize},'%')
and a.huiyishi_types = #{params.huiyishiTypes}
and a.zhuangtai_types = #{params.zhuangtaiTypes}
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
